021import net.tnemc.item.AbstractItemStack;
022import net.tnemc.item.JSONHelper;
023import net.tnemc.item.component.SerialComponent;
024import net.tnemc.item.component.helper.DamageReduction;
025import net.tnemc.item.component.helper.ItemDamage;
026import net.tnemc.item.platform.ItemPlatform;
027import org.json.simple.JSONArray;
028import org.json.simple.JSONObject;
029
030import java.util.ArrayList;
031import java.util.Arrays;
032import java.util.List;
033import java.util.Objects;
034
035/**
036 * BlocksAttacksComponent - When present, this item can be used like a Shield to block attacks to the
037 * holding player. Added in MC 1.21.5
038 *
039 * @author creatorfromhell
040 * @see <a href="https://minecraft.wiki/w/Data_component_format#blocks_attacks">Reference</a>
041 * <p>
042 * @since 0.2.0.0
043 */
044public abstract class BlocksAttacksComponent<I extends AbstractItemStack<T>, T> implements SerialComponent<I, T> {
045
046  protected final List<DamageReduction> reductions = new ArrayList<>();
047
048  protected final List<String> bypassedBy = new ArrayList<>();
049
050  protected ItemDamage itemDamage = null;
051
052  //The number of seconds that right-click must be held before successfully blocking attacks
053  protected float blockDelay = 0;
054
055  //Multiplier applied to the number of seconds that the item will be on cooldown for when attacked
056  //by a disabling attack (disable_blocking_for_seconds on the weapon component)
057  //If 0, this item can never be disabled by attacks
058  protected float disableCooldownScale = 1;
059
060  protected String blockSound = "";
061
062  protected String disableSound = "";
063
064  public BlocksAttacksComponent() {
065
066  }
067
068  /**
069   * @return the type of component this is.
070   */
071  @Override
072  public String identifier() {
073
074    return "blocks_attacks";
075  }
076
077  /**
078   * Converts the {@link SerialComponent} to a JSON object.
079   *
080   * @return The JSONObject representing this {@link SerialComponent}.
081   */
082  @Override
083  public JSONObject toJSON() {
084
085    final JSONObject json = new JSONObject();
086
087    //Serialize DamageReductions
088    final JSONArray reductionsArray = new JSONArray();
089    for(final DamageReduction reduction : reductions) {
090
091      final JSONObject reductionJson = new JSONObject();
092      reductionJson.put("type", reduction.type());
093      reductionJson.put("base", reduction.base());
094      reductionJson.put("factor", reduction.factor());
095      reductionJson.put("horizontalBlockingAngle", reduction.horizontalBlockingAngle());
096      reductionsArray.add(reductionJson);
097    }
098    json.put("reductions", reductionsArray);
099
100
101    //Serialize bypassedBy
102    final JSONArray bypassedByArray = new JSONArray();
103    for(final String bypassedBy : bypassedBy) {
104
105      bypassedByArray.add(bypassedBy);
106    }
107    json.put("bypassedBy", bypassedByArray);
108
109    // Serialize ItemDamage
110    if(itemDamage != null) {
111
112      final JSONObject itemDamageJson = new JSONObject();
113
114      itemDamageJson.put("threshold", itemDamage.threshold());
115      itemDamageJson.put("base", itemDamage.base());
116      itemDamageJson.put("factor", itemDamage.factor());
117      json.put("item_damage", itemDamageJson);
118    }
119
120    // Serialize other properties
121    json.put("block_delay", blockDelay);
122    json.put("disable_cooldown_scale", disableCooldownScale);
123    json.put("block_sound", blockSound);
124    json.put("disable_sound", disableSound);
125
126    return json;
127  }
128
129  /**
130   * Reads JSON data and converts it back to a {@link SerialComponent} object.
131   *
132   * @param json The JSONHelper instance of the json data.
133   */
134  @Override
135  public void readJSON(final JSONHelper json, final ItemPlatform<I, T> platform) {
136
137    //Deserialize DamageReductions
138    final JSONArray reductionsArray = (JSONArray)json.getObject().get("reductions");
139    reductions.clear();
140
141    if(reductionsArray != null) {
142
143      for(final Object obj : reductionsArray) {
144
145        final JSONObject reductionJson = (JSONObject)obj;
146        final String type = reductionJson.get("type").toString();
147        final float base = Float.parseFloat(reductionJson.get("base").toString());
148        final float factor = Float.parseFloat(reductionJson.get("factor").toString());
149        final float horizontalBlockingAngle = Float.parseFloat(reductionJson.get("horizontalBlockingAngle").toString());
150        reductions.add(new DamageReduction(type, base, factor, horizontalBlockingAngle));
151      }
152    }
153
154    //Deserialize bypassBy
155    final JSONArray bypassByArray = (JSONArray)json.getObject().get("bypassedBy");
156    bypassedBy.clear();
157
158    if(bypassByArray != null) {
159
160      for(final Object obj : bypassByArray) {
161
162        bypassedBy.add(obj.toString());
163      }
164    }
165
166    //Deserialize ItemDamage
167    final JSONObject itemDamageJson = (JSONObject) json.getObject().get("item_damage");
168    if(itemDamageJson != null) {
169
170      final float threshold = Float.parseFloat(itemDamageJson.get("threshold").toString());
171      final float base = Float.parseFloat(itemDamageJson.get("base").toString());
172      final float factor = Float.parseFloat(itemDamageJson.get("factor").toString());
173      itemDamage = new ItemDamage(threshold, base, factor);
174    }
175
176    //Deserialize other properties
177    blockDelay = json.getFloat("block_delay");
178    disableCooldownScale = json.getFloat("disable_cooldown_scale");
179    blockSound = json.getString("block_sound");
180    disableSound = json.getString("disable_sound");
181  }
182
183  /**
184   * Used to determine if some data is equal to this data. This means that it has to be an exact
185   * copy of this data. For instance, book copies will return false when compared to the original.
186   *
187   * @param component The component to compare.
188   *
189   * @return True if similar, otherwise false.
190   */
191  @Override
192  public boolean equals(final SerialComponent<I, T> component) {
193
194    if(!(component instanceof final BlocksAttacksComponent<?, ?> other)) return false;
195
196    return Objects.equals(this.reductions, other.reductions) &&
197           Objects.equals(this.bypassedBy, other.bypassedBy) &&
198           Objects.equals(this.itemDamage, other.itemDamage) &&
199           Float.compare(this.blockDelay, other.blockDelay) == 0 &&
200           Float.compare(this.disableCooldownScale, other.disableCooldownScale) == 0 &&
201           Objects.equals(this.blockSound, other.blockSound) &&
202           Objects.equals(this.disableSound, other.disableSound);
203  }
204
205  @Override
206  public int hashCode() {
207
208    return Objects.hash(reductions, bypassedBy, itemDamage, blockDelay, disableCooldownScale, blockSound, disableSound);
209  }
210
211  public List<DamageReduction> reductions() {
212
213    return reductions;
214  }
215
216  public void reductions(final List<DamageReduction> reductions) {
217
218    this.reductions.clear();
219    this.reductions.addAll(reductions);
220  }
221
222  public void reductions(final DamageReduction... reductions) {
223
224    this.reductions.clear();
225    this.reductions.addAll(Arrays.asList(reductions));
226  }
227
228  public List<String> bypassedBy() {
229
230    return bypassedBy;
231  }
232
233  public void bypassedBy(final List<String> bypassedBy) {
234
235    this.bypassedBy.clear();
236    this.bypassedBy.addAll(bypassedBy);
237  }
238
239  public void bypassedBy(final String... bypassedBy) {
240
241    this.bypassedBy.clear();
242    this.bypassedBy.addAll(Arrays.asList(bypassedBy));
243  }
244
245  public ItemDamage itemDamage() {
246
247    return itemDamage;
248  }
249
250  public void itemDamage(final ItemDamage itemDamage) {
251
252    this.itemDamage = itemDamage;
253  }
254
255  public float blockDelay() {
256
257    return blockDelay;
258  }
259
260  public void blockDelay(final float blockDelay) {
261
262    this.blockDelay = blockDelay;
263  }
264
265  public float disableCooldownScale() {
266
267    return disableCooldownScale;
268  }
269
270  public void disableCooldownScale(final float disableCooldownScale) {
271
272    this.disableCooldownScale = disableCooldownScale;
273  }
274
275  public String blockSound() {
276
277    return blockSound;
278  }
279
280  public void blockSound(final String blockSound) {
281
282    this.blockSound = blockSound;
283  }
284
285  public String disableSound() {
286
287    return disableSound;
288  }
289
290  public void disableSound(final String disableSound) {
291
292    this.disableSound = disableSound;
293  }
294}
